title: Waste Package Monitoring LoRa Node Metadata
description: Metadata for a waste package monitoring LoRa Node, equipped with 1 to 8 radiation sensors and 1 battery monitor.

Node_ID.description: A unique identifier for the LoRa Node. Ex: 0x2_UniPi

Node_Type.description: Description of the function of the LoRa Node ans its measuring capabilities. Ex: Radiation_Monitor

Node_Serial_No.description: Serial No of the LoRa Node. By default consists in Node_ID + Node_Type, Ex: 0x2_UniPi_Radiation_Monitor

Manufacturer.description: Manufacturer of the LoRa Node. Ex: UniPi

Manufacturer_Date.description: Manufacturing date of the LoRa Node. Expressed as dd-mm-yyyy. Ex: 15-10-2021

Validity_Date.description: Validity Date given by the Manufacturer. Expressed as dd-mm-yyy. Ex: 15-10-2031

Measure_Channel_1.description: description of what channel_1 is measuring. Ex: channel_1_cts

Measure_Channel_2.description: description of what channel_2 is measuring. Ex: channel_2_cts
